alert.note: Alert for Carter; Shannon (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 10:37AM CDT until May 08 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Springfield MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Current River near Powder Mill affecting Carter and Shannon Counties. .Heavy rainfall received yesterday and early today combined with additional rainfall expected through today will lead to river rises. For the Current River...including Powder Mill...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Current River near Powder Mill. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, County Road 106-531 south of the gage floods near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 5.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this afternoon to a crest of 10.5 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. Friday morning at 1045 AM CDT.
